languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается.{/n} "Какая досада — это явно не Иремерисс, архонт кабала, которую мы имели неудовольствие лицезреть на Веабосе. Опять придется иметь дело с пешкой вместо главного источника проблем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается.{/n} "Какая досада — это явно не Иремерисс, архонт кабала, которую мы имели неудовольствие лицезреть на Веабосе. Опять придется иметь дело с пешкой вместо главного источника проблем".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс прищуривается.{/n} "Какая досада — это явно не Иремерисс, архонт кабала, которую мы имели неудовольствие лицезреть на Веабосе. Опять придется иметь дело с пешкой вместо главного источника проблем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos-VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos-VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

{n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

languages.text: {n}海因里希眯起了眼睛。{/n}“真是令人失望。很显然，这个人并不是阴谋团的执政官伊芮梅莉斯。我们曾在六号星与她不期而遇，可现在，站在我们面前的并不是问题真正的根源，仅仅是她的又一个走卒而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希眯起了眼睛。{/n}“真是令人失望。很显然，这个人并不是阴谋团的执政官伊芮梅莉斯。我们曾在六号星与她不期而遇，可现在，站在我们面前的并不是问题真正的根源，仅仅是她的又一个走卒而已。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Qué decepción. Es evidente que no es Yremeryss, la Arconte de la Kábala que tuvimos la desgracia de encontrar en Vheabos VI. Una vez más, estamos tratando con un peón y no con la raíz del problema».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «Qué decepción. Es evidente que no es Yremeryss, la Arconte de la Kábala que tuvimos la desgracia de encontrar en Vheabos VI. Una vez más, estamos tratando con un peón y no con la raíz del problema».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細める。{/n}「がっかりだな。こいつはどう見てもヴィアボス・VIで嫌な目に遭わせてくれた陰謀団のアーコン、イレメリスじゃない。問題の黒幕ではなく、またしても手駒の1体を相手にする羽目になるとは」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細める。{/n}「がっかりだな。こいつはどう見てもイレメリスじゃない、ヴィーボスVIで嫌な目に遭わせてくれた陰謀団のアーコンだ。問題の黒幕ではなく、またポーン1体を処理するとは」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux.{/n} « Quelle déception. Ce n'est clairement pas Yremeryss, l'archonte de la Kabale que nous avons eu le malheur de rencontrer sur Vhéabos-VI. Une fois encore, nous nous retrouvons face à un pion, plutôt que devant la véritable source du problème. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux.{/n} « Quelle déception. Ce n'est clairement pas Yremeryss, l'archonte de la Kabale que nous avons eu le malheur de rencontrer sur Vhéabos-VI. Une fois encore, nous nous retrouvons face à un pion, plutôt que devant la véritable source du problème. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was für eine Enttäuschung! Das ist eindeutig nicht Yremeryss, die Archontin der Kabale, die zu treffen wir auf Vheabos VI das Missvergnügen hatten. Wieder einmal haben wir es mit einer Marionette zu tun und nicht mit der eigentlichen Wurzel des Übels."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Was für eine Enttäuschung! Das ist eindeutig nicht Yremeryss, die Archontin der Kabale, die zu treffen wir auf Vheabos VI das Missvergnügen hatten. Wieder einmal haben wir es mit einer Marionette zu tun und nicht mit der eigentlichen Wurzel des Übels."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Tam bir hayal kırıklığı. Bu zenonun, Vheabos VI'da karşılaşma talihsizliğini yaşadığımız Kabal'ın Arkon'u Yremeryss olmadığı çok bariz. Bir kez daha sorunun özüyle değil, sıradan bir piyonla karşı karşıyayız."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix narrows his eyes.{/n} "How disappointing. This clearly isn't Yremeryss, the Kabal's Archon whom we had the displeasure of meeting on Vheabos VI. Once again we are dealing with a pawn instead of the true root of the problem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Tam bir hayal kırıklığı. Bu zenonun, Vheabos VI'da karşılaşma talihsizliğini yaşadığımız Kabal'ın Arkon'u Yremeryss olmadığı çok bariz. Bir kez daha sorunun özüyle değil, sıradan bir piyonla karşı karşıyayız."
